text: BK Ume-Trixa is a sports club in Umeå, Sweden. It was established in 1981. The club earlier played rink bandy and bandy. It now instead runs women's ice hockey. The women's bandy team played seven seasons in the Swedish top division. == References == ==Other websites== *Trixa Hockey Category:1981 establishments in Europe Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Ice hockey teams in Sweden Category:Sport in Umeå Category:1980s establishments in Sweden
title: BK Ume-Trixa
